data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
None of the similar modules met my two basic needs:

    1) simple API, minimising lines of code to talk to websites 2)
    ability to work together with standard Perl testing tools

    WWW::Automate has an API reminiscent of WWW::Chat, but as a proper
    OO module rather than a pre-processed mini-language, it is well
    suited to use in testing situations.
